Player

Class Buttons

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player.Buttons
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener

    public class Buttons
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.lang.Runnable
    this class implements the actionlistener and the runnable interfaces and create 7 buttons (play , stop, pause, next track , previus track , volume up , volume down)
    Author:
    andreas
